page.title: 19OTTINGE COURT FARM
page.content: Ottinge Court Farm covers 19\ acres. There are 170 cows, 80 Jerseys, 90 Freisians. There are two cattle dogs and 27 pieces of machinery. Machinery: 3 tractors, 1 four wheel drive pallet handling tractor, 1 forage harvester,1 slurry tanker,1 mower conditioner,1 large mixed/grinder,3 trailors-silage,1 yard scraper,1 crop sprayer,1 fertilizer spreader,1 plough,1 disc harrow,1 corn harrow,1 grass harrow,1 ring roller,1 heavy roller,1 spring tyne cultivator,1 dung spreader,1 hay turner,1 round baler,1 cubide straw chopper,1 square baler and 1 computer for feeding cows. Since the new E.E.C. milk regulations have been put into action the farm has stopped feeding concentrates and grows its own cattle feed.This is regulated by computer.
